Articles.Content:
Hello all. I'm new to KSP and find it fascinating just what you all have managed to create or add to it.

Maybe someday I might make my own mod, if I ever have time.

I have set up an imgur profile and my first album, is there anything else I should set up involving other sites?

Edited February 3, 2014 by Tenneko Kazeno

Hello Tenneko Kazeno. Imgur is nice for picture use, but if you plan to share your ship designs with other players, you'll need a file-sharing service as well. I like Mediafire.com. Someone else will have to give you advice about sharing mods, since I don't use them.
Thank you. I will look into setting up a account.
